title: Run Away!
author: JGray
text:
Wow. Page 91 of chapter 6. Its impressive.

Mind you, I spent part of my weekend re-reading through the archives of El Goonish Shive so maybe it isn't as impressive as it could be but I'm still pretty proud. Also, damn you Dan Shive for being so awesome.

Ahem.

Do you like ponies? My Little Ponies? Do you play RPGs? Did you know there's a MLP-like world setting for Pathfinder called Ponyfinder? Did you know that I've written an adventure for that setting that's all about finding a pony pirate queen's hidden treasure?

You didn't!

Well I did! You can buy it here!

Yay! Pony pirates! Arrrggggh pony!

See you Thursday.

replies.author: TC*Guest*
replies.text: Oh how I love the fact that you're an EGS fan. :3

replies.author: Lukkai*Guest*
replies.text:
I know that problem with rereading the EGS archive. I've done it at least twice by now.

Gotta say that I came onto the webcomic world by way of Megatokyo, then Applegeeks, Machall, Exploitation Now and soon after a whole number, EGS included.

replies.author: fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Has anyone here encountered Wapsi Square?

replies.author: Pseudo*Guest*
replies.text: When Theresa says they can't fight it, is that an official devil-power pronouncement?
